content:
that's what I don't get
How looting and burning is a peaceful protest, and how are people that are fed up with the government raiding government building, instead of looting apple shops, are domestic terrorists?
What the fuck is wrong with americans?
Zog
What’s with fuel rods?
me and the boys
When someone praises communism, ask them to name at least one successful commie country that didn’t turn into a dystopia or a shithole, or both
Concentration camps and social point system?
Doesn’t make it a bit better IMO
China is all around dystopian hole

What happens when you talk shit about government in most of the civilized countries? Nothing 
I’m China? Your social score goes down, you can’t leave the city, your kids won’t get good education, also forget about good healthcare, you will be treated with leftovers and after a long wait
There are no good countries, but I don’t get the “defending a dictatorship that is almost comedically dystopian” stance

But you do you
U have ur opinion, I have mine, and I don’t think that those are going to change any time
Damn, and I started that shitstorm just by saying that communism sucks
My life is a fucking meme channel
Do whatever the fuck you want with yourself, but if you touch kids you should be publicly stoned to death
Heya
*throws shit*
*eats a ‘nanner*
So, how do I join properly?
And where are you guys based?
I mean in game, which origin station?
Is there a way to fast travel between stations?
Fuuuuuuck
I’m on 8
I've decided to read reviews for the game on steam, peak comedy

people complaining about the bugs
in the early access game
3 days after release
boy oh boy, do I have to shill out on clown badges
Why yes, I do gift every negative review of a game I like a clown badge, how could you tell?
